snippet.title: American Truck Simulator - Arkansas Video Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to explore & haul a variety of loads through Arkansas in American Truck Simulator. Discover hidden gems, local industries, history, culture, cities, and more on the road ahead! 

Ready to go on September 16th? Add it to your Steam Wishlist TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585150/American_Truck_Simulator__Arkansas/
